channel.title: VMware on davidstamen.com
channel.description: Recent content in VMware on davidstamen.com

item.title: Installing and Updating the Pure Storage vSphere Plugin
item.description: Welcome to the first of many Pure Storage blogs. As I get ramped up with the latest information I plan to do a series of getting started with Pure Storage features. These blogs will cover things such as the vSphere Client (HTML5) Plugin, FlashArray, FlashBlade and integrations with other VMware products. First up is learning to install and update the Pure Storage vSphere Client Plugin.
